text: Sir Charles Walter Michael Court (29 September 1911 â€“ 22 December 2007) was the 21st Premier of Western Australia from 8 April 1974 to 25 January 1982. He was from the Liberal Party. He became a politician in 1953. His son, Richard, was also a Premier. ==References== Category:1911 births Court, Charles Category:People from Sussex Category:Liberal Party of Australia politicians
title: Charles Court
